      • execute

        public void execute(Player p1,
                    Player p2)
        executes the effect of the action card, this is for 2 players
        Parameters:
        p1 - is the player who got the card
        p2 - is the player who can get affected by the card

      • execute

        public void execute(Player p1,
                    Player p2,
                    Player p3)
        executes the effect of the action card, this is for 3 players
        Parameters:
        p1 - is the player who got the card
        p2 - is the other player who can get affected by the card
        p3 - is the other player who can get affected by the card

      • hasFinishDeck

        public boolean hasFinishDeck()
        checks if the deck is already finished
        Returns:
        true if finished, false otherwise
